thread.section_title: FabKids Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FabKids | fabkids.com | 4 of 116
thread.title: Oscar

author: Oscar
title: Oscar
text: As a single father I had a lot of trouble shopping for clothes for my daughter, half the time she looked like a boy lol. When I found out about Fabkids I immediately looked in to it and loved the idea of it. I loved the outfits and the way it worked. Upon receiving my first order I wasn't disappointed, the fabric feels great and my daughter loved it. Fabkids is pretty amazing and it saved time and a big headache lol
